description.value: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance. If you use your next action to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell} that has the monk trait and no duration, the spell and any @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strikes} you make as a result of casting it ignore an amount of the target's resistance to physical damage equal to your level.
